headline: Jade Moore to join Tampa Bay Sun
summary: Jade Moore will be transferring to Tampa Bay Sun when her contract with Birmingham City expires at the end of the month. The 33-year-old midfielder has over 50 caps for England and joined the Blues […]

headline: ScottishPower Women’s Premier League 2024/25 fixtures published
summary: The SWPL has announced fixtures for the 2024/25 ScottishPower Women’s Premier League season which gets underway on Sunday 11 August. The opening round of fixtures will see reigning champions Celtic at home to Dundee United […]

headline: London City appoint Jocelyn Prêcheur and sign Kosovare Asllani

headline: Man Utd Women’s captain Katie Zelem departing
summary: Manchester United have today confirmed that midfielder Katie Zelem will leave the club following the conclusion of her contract. The 28-year-old former Liverpool player joined the Reds from Juventus in 2018 and made a total […]

headline: Emma Koivisto leaves Liverpool Women for AC Milan
summary: Finnish international winger Emma Koivisto has ended her time with Liverpool by signing for AC Milan in a three-year deal. Closing in on 100 caps for her country, the 29-year-old played 40 times for Liverpool […]

headline: Spurs Women make Amanda Nildén loan move permanent
summary: Tottenham Hotspur have signed Sweden international defender Amanda Nildén on a permanent deal following her loan spell from Juventus. The attack-minded full-back, who joined Spurs in January and started in ten consecutive games, signs on […]

headline: Lucia Garcia leaving Manchester United Women
summary: Spanish international Lucia Garcia is to leave Manchester United when her contract expires at the end of this month. Garcia helped United to their highest-ever WSL position of second in 2022/23, to UWCL qualification for […]

headline: Scotland Women’s squad selected for Euro qualifiers in July
summary: Pedro Martinez Losa has selected his Scotland squad for July’s qualifiers for the UEFA Women’s Championship. Scotland go into the last two League B group games unbeaten, after three wins and a draw. They are […]

headline: Kirsten Reilly rejoins Hibernian Women after leaving Crystal Palace
summary: Midfielder Kirsten Reilly has returned to Hibernian on a two-year deal after helping Crystal Palace clinch promotion to the WSL. She left Hibs in 2019 and joined Bristol City, before helping Rangers win their first […]

headline: Chelsea Women extend contract of England U-19 defender Cerys Brown
summary: Chelsea have taken the option to extend the contract of England U-19 defender Cerys Brown ahead of the 2024/25 campaign. The full back who has just turned 19, signed her first professional contract with Chelsea […]
